module.name: onCollision
module.annotation: Describes what happens whenever the unit collides with another one.

requirement.name: enemyName
requirement.annotation: The name of the unit to collide with.

argument.name: x
argument.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit

argument.name: y
argument.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit

argument.name: dx
argument.annotation: The x coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

argument.name: dy
argument.annotation: The y coordinate of the unit`s velocity vector

argument.name: points
argument.annotation: The points of points module

argument.name: stillPlaying
argument.annotation: Set to false to end the game
